Don't choose this professorâ€”you'll regret it.  
There's a quiz before every class, the lectures are super boring, and you're not even allowed to look at your device for too long (he'll call you out).
I genueinly dont see why people hate him, yes he's a tough grader but if you actually try to understand the course material, it'll be easy for you to get a good grade. ps he's a pretty chill guy.

I took his class a few years ago... so maybe his stats have changed.  But he spoke in monotone, repeating everything from the course package, and by the end of the term only 1/3 of students were left attending the class!!
